events.name: Drupal Global Training Day: Introduction to Drupal
events.description: Drupal Global Training Days is an initiative of the Drupal Association. The Drupal Association partners with companies and local community groups around the world to host these introductory Drupal trainings.  Each training day is its own workshop. As an attendee, you get helpful information for evaluating Drupal as a framework and as a career path. You also learn enough of the basics to leave a workshop having successfully built a Drupal site. We've not decided whether to cover Drupal 7 or Drupal 8 in this session so leave a comment below to tell us :) Limited seats available! This training session is organised by Pixel Onion. What to bring for the session: • Laptop with power adapter, mac or windows is fine • Water bottle, in case you get thirsty during the session, there are water cooler provided • Writing materials • An open mind :) Lunch is not provided for the session but there's a food court downstairs with plenty of food choices. Please leave a comment below if you have any questions!

events.name: UX TL;DR is a learning event where everyone participates!
events.description:
Have you ever come across something new in UX, had the browser tab open for weeks, but never found time to research it? Use this event as an excuse to dig a little deeper. Please bring a laptop or sketchbook. Join to level-up your design and research knowledge, meet other UXers, or learn about the methods used by designers and researchers at the venue. 


7:00 PM - Arrival, seating, & drinks  7:15 PM - Intro talk by the host  7:30 PM - R&D: random team assignment, choose a topic, learn something new  9:00 PM - Q&A: share what your team learned  9:30 - 10:00 PM - The end
events.location: General Assembly Singapore, The Working Capitol, 1 Keong Saik Road, Level 3, Singapore 089101 (Turn left on the side lane beside Lollapalooza and walk up to
